title: Ep. #115 | Catching Up: Armaan Malik
description:
Upon the release and following success of their collaboration song 'Echo' with producer KSHMR, Eric and Armaan catch up on how they first connected on the project. They also discuss Armaan's journey from singing on Bollywood tracks to becoming a major solo pop artist.

Thank you LA Times for sponsoring this episode! Asian Enough season two is now available to stream on latimes.com, or listen and subscribe on Apple, Spotify or wherever you get podcasts.
Thank you StoryWorth for sponsoring this episode! Get $10 off your first purchase by visiting https://storyworth.com/kpop
Thank you Honey for sponsoring this episode! Get Honey for FREE at https://joinhoney.com/kpop
Thank you BetterHelp for sponsoring this episode! Get 10% off your first month by visiting https://betterhelp.com/kpop

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.
